snippet: John Greyson and Tarek Loubani, Canadians detained in Egypt in August and still barred from leaving the country, posted a message of thanks to their supporters on YouTube on Wednesday.
abstract: John Greyson and Tarek Loubani, Canadians detained in Egypt in August and still barred from leaving the country, posted a message of thanks to their supporters on YouTube on Wednesday.

headline.main: Canadians Stuck in Egyptian Legal Limbo Thank Supporters via YouTube

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
